## FailedVertical.errorType property

The type of error causing the failure. Possible options are "TIMEOUT", "BACKEND\_ERROR", "INVALID\_CONFIG", and "INVALID\_QUERY".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
errorType: string;
```
